FILE_TYPE_BODY: We accept the following file types:
FILE_TYPE_LIST_ITEM_4B: Compressed archive containing any of the above
FILE_TYPE_INSET_TEXT: Use CSV files where possible for electoral data.
FILE_FORMAT_BODY: We can process electoral register data from the following electoral management systems:
FILE_FORMAT_HINT_TEXT: If you are unsure whether your system format is compatible, contact the Jury Central Summoning Bureau before uploading.
OVER_76_BODY: If your electoral management system includes an 'Over 76's' flag or marker, ensure this is included in your data file. This helps identify electors who are not required to serve on a jury.
OTHER_MARKERS_BODY: Your file may include other markers or flags that identify specific elector types. Common markers include:
OTHER_MARKERS_BODY_2: Include all markers present in your electoral register data. If your system uses different marker codes, contact the Jury Central Summoning Bureau for guidance.
IMPORTANT_ZIP_BODY: If you are using a ZIP file format to upload your data, note the following:
IMPORTANT_ZIP_INSET_TEXT_3: These file types cannot be processed and will cause your upload to be rejected.
IMPORTANT_ZIP_INSET_TEXT_4: ZIP files must not be password protected. The portal will no longer accept password protected files.
